text: is a Japanese handball player for Puente Genil and the Japanese national team. He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male handball players Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Japanese expatriates in Spain Category:Liga ASOBAL players Category:Sportspeople from Okinawa Prefecture
